desc: The Lemonade Boutique, clothing with a cause. Ethically made clothing made by women facing extreme challenges such as sex trafficking, abuse, addiction, disabilities, and extreme poverty. Organic cotton and fair trade clothing and accessories. Online boutique filled with give back brands. Based in Louisville, Kentucky.

layout.text: We partner with those who help women take life's lemons and make lemonade. We believe in holistic healing driven by fair and sustainable employment.
